plot: A mathematician figures out the exact time the world will end, and it's sooner than he'd even anticipated. With time running out, he spends his last few days attempting to find forgiveness from the woman he's always loved.
title: Until Tomorrow, Then
plot_es: A mathematician figures out the exact time the world will end, and it's sooner than he'd even anticipated. With time running out, he spends his last few days attempting to find forgiveness from the woman he's always loved.
plot_en: A mathematician figures out the exact time the world will end, and it's sooner than he'd even anticipated. With time running out, he spends his last few days attempting to find forgiveness from the woman he's always loved.
